        About this item

        • Comb and Flat Iron in One - TYMO RING straightening comb combines a comb & flat hair iron in one to deliver super straight hairstyle and blowout look in a single pass, making hair styling easier and more efficient than a flat iron hair straightener.
        • PTC Heating & 3D Brush Teeth - TYMO hair straightener brush adopts 3D brush teeth with PTC heating technology to deliver even heat, reducing 50% heat damage and creates salon grades result without frizz.
        • 5 Heat Settings for Different Hair Types - The hair straightening brush has 5 temperature settings for different hair types. Heating up in just 20 seconds, the hair brush straightener saves you time during your morning rush.
        • Anti-scald & Auto-off Features - With an anti-scald exterior, you can use the straightening brush with easy and confidence. Moreover, it automatically shuts off after 30 minutes of inactivity to prevent accidental burns.
        • What’s Included - The straightener Comb comes with 1x detangling brush, 2x clips, 1x heatproof glove and 1x bag for easy pack and go. With its dual voltage capability, TYMO RING is a compact travel hair straightener to make your hair fantastic no matter where you are.

        How customer reviews and ratings work

        Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

        To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

        Learn more how customers reviews work on Amazon

        5 Stars
        TEEMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb - The Perfect Blend of Convenience and Results
        I recently purchased the TYMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb, and I must say, it's become an essential part of my haircare routine. This innovative product combines the best of both worlds by acting as a comb and a flat iron, making hairstyling a breeze.I absolutely adore this hot comb-style straightener. It performs exceptionally well when it comes to achieving perfectly straight roots without the risk of burning myself (unlike my boyfriend's attempts with the TYMO). It leaves my hair looking as sleek as if a professional stylist had done it. Surprisingly, I actually prefer it over my flat iron. It allows me to work with larger sections of hair, significantly speeding up the straightening process (usually around an hour, give or take a few minutes). To get the best results, I always start by blow-drying my hair. I haven't tried straightening my hair without pre-blow-drying it, mainly because I live in a very humid area and rely on humidity control products like "WOW" to combat frizz.The only challenge I haven't quite mastered is getting my ends as straight as the rest of my hair. Admittedly, I'm due for a trim. I still have to use my flat iron on my ends to make them look nice. To ensure a smooth finish, I use a brush to chase both the straightener and flat iron, as I've found this technique delivers the best results, especially for my damaged ends.Occasionally, I've experienced the straightener shutting off when I accidentally hit the button. However, overall, it's well-designed, not too heavy, and comfortable to hold. It's worth noting that the back of the straightener does get quite warm, although not hot enough to cause damage or discomfort—just enough to be noticeable.As a tip, I like to approach straightening from different angles to ensure that all my curls are properly straightened. This means working under the section, above the section, and sometimes on one side of the section, depending on where I'm working on my head. Additionally, I don't use the highest heat setting to avoid potential heat damage, yet it still manages to leave my hair bone straight.Here's why I'm loving it:Pros:1. Efficient Styling: As someone with naturally curly hair, I was initially skeptical about whether the TYMO Ring could replace my flat iron. While it doesn't give me pin-straight hair like a flat iron, it delivers a fantastic blow-dry look that I adore. It's a time-saver, and I can effortlessly achieve a sleek and stylish appearance.2. Silky Smooth Hair: Using the TYMO Ring leaves my hair incredibly soft to the touch. My husband even commented on how my hair shines after using it, which is a huge confidence booster.3. Versatile Styling: Unlike my flat iron, the TYMO Ring allows me to do various hairstyles with ease. It's particularly impressive at getting close to the roots, which is crucial for someone with curly hair like mine. You can even use it to touch up curls if you prefer roller sets.4. Temperature Control: The five heat settings cater to different hair types, and it heats up in just 20 seconds. This feature is a time-saver during busy mornings.5. Anti-Scald and Auto-Off: The anti-scald design instills confidence, and the auto-off function after 30 minutes of inactivity ensures safety.Cons:1. Position of the Power Button: The power button's placement can be a bit inconvenient during styling. I've accidentally turned it off a few times.2. Auto-Off Notification: While the auto-off feature is handy, I wish it had an audible alert to notify when it shuts off. I've had instances where I continued styling with reduced heat unknowingly.Accessories:• Glove: I didn't find the glove useful due to the textured dots, which made it uncomfortable for touching the hair. I prefer not using it.• Clips: The included clips are fantastic. They provide a secure hold while styling.• Bag: The TYMO bag is cute and made of quality material, making it a great addition for storage and travel.• Detangling Brush: The detangling brush is decent, though not exceptional. It serves its purpose but could have improved bristle design.In summary, the TYMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb is a game-changer for me. It might not replace a flat iron entirely, but its convenience, versatility, and the quality of results make it a valuable addition to my haircare arsenal. Plus, it comes at an affordable price point, making it even more appealing. If you're looking for a reliable and efficient hair straightening solution, I highly recommend giving the TYMO Ring a try. It's certainly transformed my hair routine for the better!

        Omar Diaz
        5.0 out of 5 stars TEEMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb - The Perfect Blend of Convenience and Results
        Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
        Color: BlackVerified Purchase
        I recently purchased the TYMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb, and I must say, it's become an essential part of my haircare routine. This innovative product combines the best of both worlds by acting as a comb and a flat iron, making hairstyling a breeze.
        I absolutely adore this hot comb-style straightener. It performs exceptionally well when it comes to achieving perfectly straight roots without the risk of burning myself (unlike my boyfriend's attempts with the TYMO). It leaves my hair looking as sleek as if a professional stylist had done it. Surprisingly, I actually prefer it over my flat iron. It allows me to work with larger sections of hair, significantly speeding up the straightening process (usually around an hour, give or take a few minutes). To get the best results, I always start by blow-drying my hair. I haven't tried straightening my hair without pre-blow-drying it, mainly because I live in a very humid area and rely on humidity control products like "WOW" to combat frizz.
        The only challenge I haven't quite mastered is getting my ends as straight as the rest of my hair. Admittedly, I'm due for a trim. I still have to use my flat iron on my ends to make them look nice. To ensure a smooth finish, I use a brush to chase both the straightener and flat iron, as I've found this technique delivers the best results, especially for my damaged ends.
        Occasionally, I've experienced the straightener shutting off when I accidentally hit the button. However, overall, it's well-designed, not too heavy, and comfortable to hold. It's worth noting that the back of the straightener does get quite warm, although not hot enough to cause damage or discomfort—just enough to be noticeable.
        As a tip, I like to approach straightening from different angles to ensure that all my curls are properly straightened. This means working under the section, above the section, and sometimes on one side of the section, depending on where I'm working on my head. Additionally, I don't use the highest heat setting to avoid potential heat damage, yet it still manages to leave my hair bone straight.
        Here's why I'm loving it:
        Pros:
        1. Efficient Styling: As someone with naturally curly hair, I was initially skeptical about whether the TYMO Ring could replace my flat iron. While it doesn't give me pin-straight hair like a flat iron, it delivers a fantastic blow-dry look that I adore. It's a time-saver, and I can effortlessly achieve a sleek and stylish appearance.
        2. Silky Smooth Hair: Using the TYMO Ring leaves my hair incredibly soft to the touch. My husband even commented on how my hair shines after using it, which is a huge confidence booster.
        3. Versatile Styling: Unlike my flat iron, the TYMO Ring allows me to do various hairstyles with ease. It's particularly impressive at getting close to the roots, which is crucial for someone with curly hair like mine. You can even use it to touch up curls if you prefer roller sets.
        4. Temperature Control: The five heat settings cater to different hair types, and it heats up in just 20 seconds. This feature is a time-saver during busy mornings.
        5. Anti-Scald and Auto-Off: The anti-scald design instills confidence, and the auto-off function after 30 minutes of inactivity ensures safety.
        Cons:
        1. Position of the Power Button: The power button's placement can be a bit inconvenient during styling. I've accidentally turned it off a few times.
        2. Auto-Off Notification: While the auto-off feature is handy, I wish it had an audible alert to notify when it shuts off. I've had instances where I continued styling with reduced heat unknowingly.
        Accessories:
        • Glove: I didn't find the glove useful due to the textured dots, which made it uncomfortable for touching the hair. I prefer not using it.
        • Clips: The included clips are fantastic. They provide a secure hold while styling.
        • Bag: The TYMO bag is cute and made of quality material, making it a great addition for storage and travel.
        • Detangling Brush: The detangling brush is decent, though not exceptional. It serves its purpose but could have improved bristle design.
        In summary, the TYMO Ring Hair Straightener Comb is a game-changer for me. It might not replace a flat iron entirely, but its convenience, versatility, and the quality of results make it a valuable addition to my haircare arsenal. Plus, it comes at an affordable price point, making it even more appealing. If you're looking for a reliable and efficient hair straightening solution, I highly recommend giving the TYMO Ring a try. It's certainly transformed my hair routine for the better!
